QuestData.Title: Drinks on the Rocks
QuestData.Description: What's up, "bro"! We were just in the middle of our completely spontaneous beach party when something terrible happened, "dude"!$B$BI had a whole case of Silversnap Ice, the Baron's own drink of choice, until the silt crawlers stole them! I've never seen crawlers drink, but they took them right into the water and down the beach! We need some sort of awesome hero who can help retrieve our specifically-branded favorite beverage!$B$B<Brono stares at you a moment.>$B$BThat means you, "brah"!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 bottles of Stolen Silversnap Ice from Silt Crawlers.
QuestData.RewardText: Our ice-cold, refreshing Silversnap Ice! I can't thank you enough, "dawg", for this entirely spontaneous act of heroism!$B$BHere, have your very own bottle as a totally sincere gesture of thanks! Be sure to tell ALL YOUR FRIENDS how good it is.
